alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:18PM CDT until April 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JASPER AND SOUTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mill Creek to 6 miles northeast of Ovett to near Macedonia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Jasper and southeastern Jones Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
